alert.note: Alert for Southwest Wyoming (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 1:15PM MDT until March 25 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Higher amounts of snow in the mountainous terrain. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Wyoming. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected especially along I-80.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.
